title: PETROL BOMB ATTACK ON SIYATHA TV, RADIO, SAYS MANAGER
content: A fire has occurred in the voice of Asia media organization premises in Hunupitiya, Colombo which is carrying out Siyatha TV and Siyatha Radio. The police noted that the incident had taken place around 1.20 this morning. According to the Siyatha Radio Manager Udithamal Hemachandra the building in which the TV and Radio Channel are…
